verbs.description: President Trump 's statement that he [V: can] pardon himself shows that he believes he is above the law , a stance that does not comport with the values of democracy .
President Trump 's statement that [ARG0: he] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: pardon] [ARG1: himself] shows that he believes he is above the law , a stance that does not comport with the values of democracy .
[ARG0: President Trump 's statement that he can pardon himself] [V: shows] [ARG1: that he believes he is above the law , a stance that does not comport with the values of democracy] .
President Trump 's statement that he can pardon himself shows that [ARG0: he] [V: believes] [ARG1: he is above the law , a stance that does not comport with the values of democracy] .
President Trump 's statement that he can pardon himself shows that he believes [ARG1: he] [V: is] [ARG2: above the law] , a stance that does not comport with the values of democracy .
President Trump 's statement that he can pardon himself shows that he believes he is above the law , a stance that [V: does] not comport with the values of democracy .

President Trump 's statement that he can pardon himself shows that he believes he is above the law , [ARG1: a stance] [R-ARG1: that] does [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: comport] [ARG2: with the values of democracy] .
